properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, undated [likely mid-January 1934], on stationery from the Ambassador [Hotel] in Los Angeles; includes description of trip from Honolulu to Los Angeles on the Hoover, correspondence with Mr. Dai [Enki], [William L.] Bond, and [William] Grooch; mentions [Stokely W.] Morgan.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
